goal:
Thermo Fisher Scientific Inc. (NYSE: TMO) is the world leader in serving science, with revenues of
more than $20 billion and approximately 70,000 employees globally. Our Mission is to enable our customers to make the world healthier, cleaner and safer. We help our customers accelerate life sciences research, solve complex analytical challenges, improve patient diagnostics and increase laboratory productivity.

Through our premier brands – Thermo Scientific, Applied Biosystems, Invitrogen, Fisher Scientific and Unity Lab Services – we offer an unmatched combination of innovative technologies, purchasing convenience and comprehensive support.

euInitiatives:
Thermo Fisher follows EU initiatives on the following areas and we have been only been actively involved in the revision of the In Vitro Diagnostics directive through MedTech Europe. We have not contributed to any green or white papers or consultations.

- In Vitro Diagnostics Regulation
- General Data Protection
- Health Technology Assessment
- Horizon 2020
